frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-sane-airplane-mode
frozen.shortDescription: Make airplane mode sane again! This extension gives you better control over the airplane mode.
frozen.longDescription:
Make airplane mode sane again! This extension gives you better control over the airplane mode. 
Hint: With this extension you can also turn off the annoying "Bluetooth gets turned on when I disable airplane mode" behaviour.
